generator.group: Centenary Institute of Cancer Medicine and Cell Biology

contact.group: Centenary Institute of Cancer Medicine and Cell Biology

publications.title: Generation of an induced pluripotent stem cell line from a patient with conduction disease and recurrent ventricular fibrillation with a sodium voltage-gated channel alpha subunit 5 (SCN5A) gene c.392 + 3A > G splice-site variant

donor.disease_description: 30 year old female with recurrent ventricular fibrillation, conduction disease, and non-ischemic cardiomyopathy
donor.disease_name: Left bundle branch block; recurrent ventricular fibrillation; conduction disease; non-ischemic cardiomyopathy

genomic_modifications.description: No genetic modification; heterozygous SCN5A c.392 + 3A > G splice-site variant

genomic_characterisation.summary: Normal female karyotype with no aneuploidies confirmed at passage 18.

induced_derivation.non_int_vector_name: Epi5 Episomal iPSC Reprogramming Kit (Thermo Fisher)

ethics.institutional_HREC: Ethics Review Committee, Sydney Local Health District
